it.polito.dp2.FDS

Interface FlightInstanceReader


  • public interface FlightInstanceReader
    Gives read-only access to some information about a flight instance

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Aircraft getAircraft()
      Returns information about the aircraft for this flight instance
      GregorianCalendar getDate()
      Returns the departure date for this flight instance
      int getDelay()
      Returns the delay of this flight instance (in minutes)
      String getDepartureGate()
      Returns the departure gate for this flight instance
      FlightReader getFlight()
      Returns an interface for reading flight information for this flight instance
      Set<PassengerReader> getPassengerReaders(String namePrefix)
      Returns a list of passengers of this flight instance
      FlightInstanceStatus getStatus()
      Returns the status of this flight instance

    • Method Detail

      • getDate

        GregorianCalendar getDate()
        Returns the departure date for this flight instance
        Returns:
        the scheduled departure date of the flight in a GregorianCalendar object with a time zone set to the one of the departure airport. Hours, minutes, seconds and milliseconds are meaningless.

      • getFlight

        FlightReader getFlight()
        Returns an interface for reading flight information for this flight instance
        Returns:
        a reader that gives access to flight information

      • getAircraft

        Aircraft getAircraft()
        Returns information about the aircraft for this flight instance
        Returns:
        the information about the aircraft for this flight instance

      • getStatus

        FlightInstanceStatus getStatus()
        Returns the status of this flight instance
        Returns:
        the status of this flight instance

      • getDelay

        int getDelay()
        Returns the delay of this flight instance (in minutes)
        Returns:
        the (expected or actual) delay of the flight in minutes

      • getDepartureGate

        String getDepartureGate()
        Returns the departure gate for this flight instance
        Returns:
        the departure gate assigned to this flight instance. A null is returned if the gate has not yet been assigned.

      • getPassengerReaders

        Set<PassengerReader> getPassengerReaders(String namePrefix)
        Returns a list of passengers of this flight instance
        Parameters:
        namePrefix - the prefix of the names of the passengers we want to retrieve. Null matches all names.
        Returns:
        an unordered list of readers, one for each passenger with a name that matches the given prefix
